paper_abstract: We classify antitriangular maps on I(n) by using topological dynamics. More precisely, we prove that the following properties are equivalent: (1) zero topological entropy; (2) UR(F) = R(F); (3) type less than or equal to 2(infinity); and (4) AP(F) = {(x(1), x(2), ... , x(n)) is an element of I(n) : lim F(2n) (x(1), x(2), ... , x(n)) = (x(1), x(2), ... , x(n))}. These result allow us to decide when the behavior of these n-dimensional dynamical systems is complicated.
paper_title: Topological dynamic classification of antitriangular maps
